statements: UPDATE algorithm_specific_rules SET condition='New Condition' WHERE id=1
UPDATE algorithm_specific_rules SET rule_name='New Rule Name', condition='Updated Condition' WHERE id=2
UPDATE algorithm_specific_rules SET condition = 'new condition' WHERE rule_name = 'rule1'
UPDATE algorithm_specific_rules SET rule_name = 'updated rule' WHERE id = 3
UPDATE Orders SET total_amount = 100.50, customer_id = 101 WHERE order_id = 1;
UPDATE Products SET stock_quantity = 50, price = 25.75 WHERE product_id = 101;
UPDATE AlgorithmRules SET rule_name = 'New Rule 1' WHERE rule_id = 1;
UPDATE RuleParameters SET parameter_type = 'new_type' WHERE parameter_id = 3;
UPDATE AlgorithmRules SET rule_description = 'Updated rule description', condition_query = 'NEW_CONDITION' WHERE rule_id = 1;
UPDATE RuleParameters SET parameter_type = 'String' WHERE parameter_id = 2;
UPDATE Products SET price = 15.99 WHERE product_id = 1;
UPDATE Customers SET email = 'newemail@example.com', customer_name = 'John Doe' WHERE customer_id = 2;
UPDATE Products SET price = 15.99 WHERE product_name = 'T-Shirt';
UPDATE Orders SET quantity = 10, product_id = 102 WHERE order_id = 200;
UPDATE Users SET age = 30 WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE Posts SET post_content = 'Updated post content' WHERE post_id = 5;
UPDATE Users SET age = age + 1 WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE Comments SET comment_text = 'Updated comment' WHERE comment_id = 456;
